evaluation_set.description: Mini evaluation set for WeddingEase chatbot - 8+ test prompts with expected behaviors

prompts.prompt: I need a bridal lehenga in traditional style within budget of ‚Çπ50,000 to ‚Çπ100,000 for my wedding in Mumbai

Example: '‚ú® Found 4 traditional bridal lehengas in Mumbai within your budget: 1) Raj Bridal House - ‚Çπ75,000 (heavy work) 2) Saree Palace - ‚Çπ65,000 (moderate work)...'

This gives you 8 days from now. üéØ Recommendation: Order within 24 hours to ensure buffer time for any revisions.'

prompts.prompt: This lehenga looks perfect! Can you contact the vendor to check if they do rush delivery and custom stitching?

evaluation_guidelines.tool_accuracy: Did the bot use the correct tool for the query?
evaluation_guidelines.response_quality: Is the answer helpful, accurate, and complete?
evaluation_guidelines.user_experience: Does the bot guide the user to next steps?
evaluation_guidelines.constraint_handling: Does the bot respect budget, timeline, and style preferences?
evaluation_guidelines.multi_step_orchestration: Can the bot handle complex queries requiring multiple tools?
evaluation_guidelines.graceful_degradation: How does the bot handle edge cases or infeasible scenarios?

tool_mapping.search_catalog: Find products by category, budget, style, city, vendor
tool_mapping.get_item_details: Detailed specs, customization, care for specific items
tool_mapping.get_delivery_date: Check timeline feasibility and delivery schedules
tool_mapping.send_contact_vendor: Facilitate vendor contact with specific inquiries
tool_mapping.generate_moodboard: Create visual collections and inspiration boards
tool_mapping.create_shortlist: Save items to list for comparison and sharing
tool_mapping.share_shortlist: Generate public links for family/partner feedback
